page.title: 07EVENTS IN KEYINGHAM
page.content: The village social calendar is made up of events throughout the year, which are common to both villages. The main one in each village being the annual gala, which in Ottringham is really a major even attracting people from far-a-field. Many things revolve around the churches, with Spring fares, Harvest festivals, Christmas fares and many more. Outside church associations there are in both villages groups and individuals that spend the year holding fund raising events for charity, these would take the form of sponsored events, sales of home produced goods, jumble sales an even door to door collections of money. Some purely social events - dances, parties, bar-b-q's and coach trips for a day or evening out are also organised.
